skins.shipDescription: Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number nine C Kawakaze.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Kawakaze, 3rd ship of the improved Shiratsuyu class, or simply the Umikaze class. Destroyer Division 24 comprised of my sisters and me during the war. Ah, Solomon... True, it is a place of many memories. The Iron Bottom Sound, Northampton, and the last thing I remember...
skins.acquisition: The name's Kawakaze of the Shiratsuyu class. I have no intention of becoming your friend. Spare me your introduction.
skins.details: I like fishing. When fishing, you can just clear your mind and not think about anything.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Shells are weapons to silence one's enemies with. That's all they are, no matter how you sugarcoat it.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If there's something you're wondering, ask Jintsuu. I'm... if I must say, I'd say I'm more like Sendai.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Pretty cheerful gang you've got going with this fleet...
skins.secretaryTouch: How I feel about secretary work? Work is work, I don't have any preferences. Secretary or not, I don't care.

skins.shipDescription: This must be the dream you've awaited so eagerly... Of course, I vowed to be with you to the end of our days. I shall take my rightful place beside you and your wishful thinking. We are... together.
skins.acquisition: This must be the dream you've awaited so eagerly... Of course, I vowed to be with you until the end of our days. I shall take my rightful place beside you and your ideals. We are... together.
skins.login: Today is another day devoid of change. But nothing needs to change if I can happily remain by your side.
skins.details: I want you to pay Lady Nagato a visit from time to time. There's little I can do to ease her loneliness, but I believe that you can. Don't you worry, I know you'll still come to see me as well.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The same sword that takes lives can also save them. It is my goal to become that: a sword that protects.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You must not fixate on only either brains or brawn. The ideal leader is both wise and strong. Ahahah, here I am, paraphrasing Naka.
skins.secretaryIdle3: You've got a cheerful gang going with this fleet. And you are a part of it, Commander.
skins.secretaryTouch: How I feel about secretary work? Work is work, that is all. I will gladly do anything for you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: It's humiliating to watch the other girls get ahead of me...

skins.shipDescription: Mhm. Lightweight clothing makes it easier to fight. Thanks, Commander... "It looks cute on me"? W-well, thanks...
skins.acquisition: Mhm. Lightweight clothing makes it easier to fight. Thanks, Commander... "It looks cute on me"? W-well, thanks...
skins.login: Today might actually be an eventful day.
skins.secretaryIdle1: On the battlefield, you swing your weapon and defeat the enemy, no more. Thinking about other things comes after the battle.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Sendai, how about we have a match? As for our spectators... I suppose we could ask Jintsuu and the Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Seems having some cheerful people by your side might not be so bad.
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you like kendo, too? I'll work you to the bone to make you good at it. ... Huh? You don't wanna do it?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Phew... I was considering chopping off your hand, had you gone any further.
